author: m.kalinin
content:
Kiln v2.1 is released! ðŸ”¥ðŸ§±

The new version is backwards compatible with v2. It has two changes requiring updates to implementations:
* Optimistically import any post-merge block
* Add QoS for transition config endpoint

Other than that this release includes a couple of clarifications in the Engine API spec.

Full change set https://hackmd.io/@n0ble/kiln-spec#v21-change-set
